view.title.createProjectTemplate:
[Open a folder](command:vscode.openFolder) that contains a .NET project or create a new project.
[Create New Project](command:dotrush.createProjectTemplate)
configuration.description.roslyn.workspa: Additional MSBuild properties to pass to the workspace (e.g. Configuration=Debug).
configuration.description.roslyn.skipUnr: Determines if unrecognized projects are skipped when projects are opened.
configuration.description.roslyn.loadMet: Determines if metadata from existing output assemblies is loaded instead of opening referenced projects.
configuration.description.roslyn.showIte: Determines if items from unimported namespaces are shown in completion lists.
configuration.description.roslyn.restore: Determines if projects are restored before they are loaded.
configuration.description.roslyn.compile: Determines if projects are compiled after they are loaded.
configuration.description.roslyn.project: Paths to project or solution files to load.
configuration.description.roslyn.useMult: Determines if projects from all target frameworks are diagnosed.
configuration.description.roslyn.project: When enabled, analysis will run on the entire project. Disable to limit analysis to the currently opened document.
configuration.description.roslyn.applyWo: Determines if changes made to the workspace are applied to the project files.
configuration.description.roslyn.dotnetS: Path to the SDK directory to use for .NET projects (e.g. C:\Program Files\dotnet\sdk\9.0.201).
configuration.description.roslyn.enableA: Enable support for Roslyn-based code analyzers.
configuration.description.roslyn.analyze: Paths to additional Roslyn analyzer assemblies (.dll files) to include during analysis.
configuration.description.debugger.proje: Use only project assemblies for debugging.
configuration.description.debugger.searc: Search Microsoft Symbol Server for missing PDBs.
configuration.description.debugger.autom: Automatically download source files from SourceLink.
Automatically load launchSettings.json file from the Properties folder of the startup project.
configuration.description.debugger.conso: Console to use for debugging console applications.
configuration.description.msbuild.noRest: Determines if the project will be restored before building.
configuration.description.msbuild.noDepe: Determines if the project dependencies will be built.
configuration.description.msbuild.additi: Additional arguments to pass to the build command.
Additional arguments to pass to the test command.
configuration.description.testExplorer.a: Automatically refresh tests on source code save.
configuration.description.testExplorer.s: Skip the initial pause event when starting the tests debugging. This option will be ignored for netcoredbg.
